title: Hello world!
content: There are some changes on the page, but in my opinion content and navigation trough it is very self-explanatory.
But if you are wondering, here is the list of content:
- Layout 1 = kinda pure html5 + CSS for now. If you don't like the colours - well... i like them :].
- Layout 2 = it's generally all bootstrap - I will probably add some functionality in the future.
- Text Editor = something I'm working on. More information yet to come.
- Angular store front = done during the course on Code School - link on the bottom of said page.
